MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL30 postcode area of Llandudno affecting properties in Knowles Road.  In order to complete repairs, engineers on site need to isolate the power to other properties at 1:00pm and we expect the power to be restored by 4:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:38pm on 16th December 2020.
